Uses of Interface
org.fluidity.composition.ComponentContainer.Registry

  • Packages that use ComponentContainer.Registry 
    Package Description
    org.fluidity.composition
    Dependency injection container interface and supporting artifacts.
    org.fluidity.composition.container.spi
    Service provider interfaces to be implemented by the dependency injection container implementation.
    org.fluidity.composition.spi
    Service provider interfaces to handle special cases of software composition in Fluid Tools.

    • Uses of ComponentContainer.Registry in org.fluidity.composition

      Methods in org.fluidity.composition that return ComponentContainer.Registry 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ComponentContainer.Registry MutableContainer.getRegistry()
      Returns the object through which component bindings can be added to this container.
      <T> ComponentContainer.Registry ComponentContainer.Registry.isolateComponent(Class<T> type, Class<? super T>... interfaces)
      Binds a component class to a list of component interfaces behind this registry and allows, via the returned registry, the caller to add further bindings that will only be visible to the supplied component and each other.
      Methods in org.fluidity.composition with parameters of type ComponentContainer.Registry 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ComponentContainer.Bindings.bindComponents(ComponentContainer.Registry registry)
      Add the component bindings to the given registry.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Returns the object through which component bindings can be added to this container.
